title: Umesh Yadav Breaks Two Records, Smashes 5 Sixes In 10 Balls To Score 31 Runs
text:
Adding insult to already wounded South African team, Umesh Yadav went crazy as he slammed five sixes in a quick-fire 10-ball cameo which yielded 31 runs.

AP

After been given the license to unleash with India looking to declare. Umesh Yadav took the attack to South African spinners on day two to smash five sixes in a crowd pleasing knock in Ranchi.

In doing so, Umesh Yadav broke two records on his dashing and lightening 31. He broke the record for the fastest thirty-plus score in Test cricket. Former New Zealand captain Stephen Fleming held the previous record, having score 31 off 11 deliveries.

AP

Don't Miss 1.5 K SHARES 830 SHARES

Indian pacer also broke the record of highest strike rate in a 30 plus-score after scoring at 310. In his record breaking cameo, Umesh hit five big sixes and included just a solitary single. It is an unexpected slew of records that Umesh Yadav broke, but he will no doubt be thrilled.

A day that India dominated, it was Umesh Yadav who provided the early Diwali fireworks.
description: Adding insult to already wounded South African team, Umesh Yadav went berserk as he slammed five sixes in a quick-fire 10 ball cameo which yielded 31 runs. After been given the license to unleash with India looking to declare. Umesh Yadav took the attack to South African spinners on day two to smash five sixes in a crowd pleasing knock in Ranchi.
